name: door_close
description: This function is used to close the door of a specified SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the door is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the door is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name of the door lock that needs to be closed.

parameters.name: compartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment of the door lock that needs to be closed.
